#
# This script should be used to create symlinks and set permissions in
# /dev (which is a devfs instead of a real partition).
#

cd /dev

# Place custom /dev/ entries here or in /etc/devfsd.conf.
#
# ln -sf cdroms/cdrom0    cdrom
# ln -sf misc/psaux       mouse

rm -f fd
ln -sf /proc/kcore      core
ln -sf /proc/self/fd    fd
ln -sf fd/0             stdin
ln -sf fd/1             stdout
ln -sf fd/2             stderr
